messages.subject: Re Fails?
messages.msgSnippet: When I asked if unschooling had failed, I wasnt talking about children growing into failures.  I agree that money position statues have nothing to do with
messages.messageBody:
When I asked if unschooling had failed, I wasnt talking about
children growing into failures. I agree that money position statues
have nothing to do with failing or winning. I wanted to know if any
one out there had found that ps was a better option for their
children.Had unschooling itself failed them. It was just a general
question.
3 of my 4 older children left school with no qualifications. One is
a mechanic, one head storeman and one a receptionist. My eldest, who
did get qualifictons, is in banking. I would not say any of them had
failed.
Marianne
